description: This garment-dyed version of our iconic trucker jacket is inspired by vintage American denim that's characterized by its pronounced twill line. Our updated take is rendered in left-hand twill, which maintains this feature while offering a naturally soft texture.
fitting_details: Size Big 2X has a 27.5" front body length, a 27" back body length, a 23" shoulder, a 56" chest, and a 26.5" sleeve length. Sleeve length changes 0.5" between sizes.
Size Tall 2L has a 29" front body length, a 28.5" back body length, a 23" shoulder, and a 28" sleeve length. Sleeve length changes 0.5" between sizes.
Point collar. Buttoned placket. American-made metal buttons.
Long sleeves with buttoned barrel cuffs.
Two chest buttoned pockets. Two front waist welt pockets. "Polo" label at the left chest pocket.
Adjustable buttoned tabs at the back waist.
Due to the natural characteristics of this material, the coloring may rub off onto fabrics and upholstery.
